content:
FROM www.ccs.cn-shenzhen.cr.aliyuncs.com/dade/query-plate:v1
ENV TZ "Asia/Shanghai"
WORKDIR /home
RUN rm -rf ./*
COPY ./ ./
RUN mvn package -Dmaven.test.skip=true
RUN echo "#!/bin/bash\njava -jar -Xms128m -Xmx128m -Dspring.profiles.active=\$APP_ENV ./target/query-plate-v1.0.jar" > ./start.sh
RUN chmod +x ./start.sh
CMD ["/bin/bash","/home/start.sh"]
